previewArticle.title: USA vs. Panama | International Friendly Match Preview

recapArticle.title: USA 2, Panama 0 | International Friendly Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: How weird...Jaime Penedo booed as he walks into his net at StubHub Center while Nick Rimando is cheered. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: Diskerud picks his head up, looks to the acres of space on the right...and Yedlin is not even in the TV frame. Needs to make that run #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: DeAndre Yedlin (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Blas Pérez (Panama).

timelineItems.name: Benjamin Valentine
timelineItems.text: The #USMNT doesn't have a defensive midfielder of international quality at the moment. That may be a problem.

timelineItems.name: Jason Ebbing
timelineItems.text: Rimando is doing well to take control of the team early on #transition #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Adam G
timelineItems.text: I think zardes is gonna be a serious player for Usmnt in the future. Nobody can match his athleticism.. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.comment: Blas Pérez (Panama) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jozy Altidore (USA).

timelineItems.name: North American Soccer League
timelineItems.text: Miguel is seeing plenty of the ball this far. #USAvPAN #USMNT #IbarraWatch #NASL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Eric Davis (Panama) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Blas Pérez.

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: Altidore and Perez getting into it in the middle. Altidore called for the foul, Jozy thinks he went down too easy. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Sauerschell
timelineItems.text: Important thing will be keeping the spacing consistent, creating layers in the MF #USAvPAN #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Eric Davis (Panama) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Gyasi Zardes (USA).

timelineItems.name: Dan Mayer
timelineItems.text: Great choice by Rimando to leave his line to slide clearance the ball away. Risky but it paid off. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Fidel Escobar (Panama) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Eric Davis.
Attempt missed. Leonel Parris (Panama) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Jake Montero
timelineItems.text: Yedlin had no idea Davis was breaking behind him for that cross. Rough first 15 for Deandre #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Miguel Ibarra (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Anibal Godoy (Panama).
Leonel Parris (Panama) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jozy Altidore (USA).

timelineItems.name: Guy L. Gonzalez
timelineItems.text: Not sure what it will take to sell me on Altidore, but I'd love to see Zardes step up and make it a moot point. #usmnt

timelineItems.comment: Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Rolando Blackburn (Panama).

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: People having poor games so far: Miguel Ibarra and DeAndre Yedlin. People having decent games so far: Nick Rimando and Gyasi Zardes. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by DeAndre Yedlin (USA).
Eric Davis (Panama) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: Underway in Carson for the first half of #USAvPAN and the Second half of Soccer Sunday! #USMNT going right to left in the LA sunshine.

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Michael Bradley sharp offensively. Not so much defensively. Burnt twice already. Main reason he needs Mix to stay close by. #USAvPAN #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, USA 2, Panama 0.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: FT #USMNT 2 #Panama 0. All said, a respectable showing at the office today for the US as they get their first win in six matches. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Grant Wahl
timelineItems.text: FT USA 2:0 Panama. Just a friendly, but US will take a win after just 1 in the previous 9 games. Bradley Olímpico, Zardes good in 1st start.

timelineItems.name: Samuel Driscoll
timelineItems.text: His final ball was off, but I love what I'm seeing out of Bradley. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Luis Ovalle (Panama).
Jozy Altidore (USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: MassiveCity
timelineItems.text: 2 best passes in final third so far are by Bradley, but the experts say Klinsmann wanting him to play forward is ludicrous. #USAvPAN #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  USA. Conceded by Fidel Escobar.

timelineItems.name: Benjamin Valentine
timelineItems.text: I think it's clear that if you want to attack the #USMNT today, just go down their right. Between Zardes and Yedlin, defense has checked out

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: #USMNT captain @clint_dempsey looking for the toe poke pass. http://t.co/L3e4bF8qfy

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Luis Ovalle (Panama) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Benjamin Valentine
timelineItems.text: By the way, if there are any #USMNT fans wondering why Klinsmann would experiment with three at the back - watch this game.

timelineItems.name: Brian Sciaretta
timelineItems.text: Jozy certainly not afraid to get involved in the physical side of the game today. #usmnt

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: Bradley playing at a different tempo than Panama midfield. Finds space wherever he likes. Dictating terms in possession. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Blas Pérez (Panama) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Rolando Blackburn.
Rolando Blackburn (Panama) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Matt Besler (USA).

timelineItems.name: Doug McIntyre
timelineItems.text: Great tackle from Brek Shea denies Panama a point-black chance. Didn’t see that one coming. #USAvPAN #usmnt

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  USA. Conceded by Fidel Escobar.

timelineItems.name: Kyle Sanders
timelineItems.text: His defense hasnt been great of late, but Bradley can definitely still whip in crosses. Just need someone to get on the end of one #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Mark Jezek
timelineItems.text: Like seeing the newfound physicality of the USMNT. Not going to let anyone run them over if they keep playing this way. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Grant Wahl
timelineItems.text: USA goal—Olímpico by Michael Bradley. Don't see that very often. 1-0.

timelineItems.name: Alexi Lalas
timelineItems.text: A beautiful bald Olímpico. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Matt Rieger
timelineItems.text: Beautiful corner from Bradley, that kind of ball is in demand in every league in the world #USAvPAN

timelineItems.comment: Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Eric Davis (Panama).

timelineItems.name: Spencer Bagley
timelineItems.text: Holy smokes, what a run from Ibarra. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Andrew Marcinko
timelineItems.text: Zardes out of sync with teammates twice in first minute. It's his first ever #USMNT start.

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: #USMNT corner kick. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Panama. Anibal Godoy tries a through ball, but Rolando Blackburn is caught offside.
Michael Bradley (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Luis Ovalle (Panama).

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: USA 1, PAN 0 http://t.co/zAFi5l0n5q

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Leonel Parris (Panama).
Jozy Altidore (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Steve
timelineItems.text: Shea is that creator you want on the wing, don't put him in defense. Let him run. Think coming back to MLS will be great for him #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Colleen Dempsey
timelineItems.text: Love Jozy's physical play today, but dude needs to clean up the passing #USAvPAN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by DeAndre Yedlin (USA).
Eric Davis (Panama) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Gyasi Zardes (USA).
Luis Ovalle (Panama) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Lisa Bregman
timelineItems.text: No better way to spend a Sunday! #SoccerSunday #USMNT http://t.co/Dy1MY7cR2J

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Michael Bradley (USA).
Leonel Parris (Panama) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Brennan Crose
timelineItems.text: Great counter by the US. Great composure on the ball great run and classic finish. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Brian Sciaretta
timelineItems.text: GOAL DEMPSEY!! Zardes with a beauty of play to make it happen #usmnt

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Miguel Ibarra (USA).
Anibal Godoy (Panama) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Blas Pérez (Panama) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: Joselito Seldera
timelineItems.text: #usmnt

timelineItems.name: Bryan Berlin
timelineItems.text: The #USMNT is scoring some beautiful goals today.

timelineItems.comment: Gyasi Zardes (USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Luis Ovalle (Panama).
Attempt saved. Michael Bradley (USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jozy Altidore.

timelineItems.name: ExtraTime Radio
timelineItems.text: Wow Zardes has been a factor. It's almost like pace can be a factor in a game #USMNT

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer Español
timelineItems.text: ¡GOL! En frente de su gente, @gyasinho con gran asistencia a @clint_dempsey quien lo envía al arco! #USAvPAN 2-0, 38' http://t.co/XbR8qdjNkV

timelineItems.comment: Fidel Escobar (Panama) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Clint Dempsey (USA).
Attempt saved. Michael Bradley (USA) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Gyasi Zardes.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Reichbach
timelineItems.text: This is the best I've seen the #usmnt play in some time.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by DeAndre Yedlin (USA).
Eric Davis (Panama) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matt Besler (USA).
Alfredo Stephens (Panama) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Gyasi Zardes (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Luis Ovalle (Panama).

timelineItems.name: Gerard Paccione
timelineItems.text: Zardes is playing like he truly wants to be with this team #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Austin Coury
timelineItems.text: Gyasi Zardes, Michael Bradley, and Brek Shea all look fantastic today. Bradley MOTM so far IMO #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Brek Shea (USA).
Leonel Parris (Panama) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Panama. Conceded by Jermaine Jones.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Zardes gets chopped down and gets up gingerly. Looked like the Panamanian defender clipped his ankle. #usavpan

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, USA 2, Panama 0.

timelineItems.name: Steve Fogarty
timelineItems.text: Last 25 minutes of that half was perfect. I might take Mix out for Nguyen or Trapp. He hasn't done much. #USMNT #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: Bradley outstanding in that first half. Dictating the entire affair from a deeper position. Goal just underscores his influence. #USMNT

content.caption: US put 100% of their shots on target. Getting open looks and hitting them accurately.

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: Photos from the first half. #USMNT taking a two goal lead into the brea; We'll keep you posted if there are any subs. http://t.co/JtDuj10ksF

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: #USMNT Michael Bradley making it look easy. #USAvPAN #Olimpico

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: HT and the #USMNT lead Panama 2-0. This @gyasinho kid doesn't look out of place in a @ussoccer kit.

timelineItems.name: Gyorgi
timelineItems.text: Supporting our country! #mydayinla #ibelievethatwewillwin #USMNT http://t.co/p6b4Ukwxd1

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Making Los Angeles proud. #USAvPAN http://t.co/ZDPc3Q2TVK

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins USA 2, Panama 0.

timelineItems.name: GotSoccer
timelineItems.text: Wondolowski and Sean Johnson in. Don't see reasoning for continuing with Wondo. Would have liked to see Johnson start. #USAvPAN #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Jurgen Klinsmann: "[Zardes & Ibarra] are hungry. They want to do well. They want to take people on. They take risks." #USAvPAN #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Jozy Altidore subbed at halftime as a precaution due to hamstring soreness per ESPN. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Anibal Godoy (Panama) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Yairo Yau.
Corner,  USA. Conceded by Chin Hormechea.
Corner,  Panama. Conceded by Nick Rimando.

timelineItems.name: Ben Smith
timelineItems.text: When Shea stands beside Ibarra, he looks like a giant. #gameanalysis #USMNT #USAvPAN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Miguel Ibarra (USA).
Leonel Parris (Panama) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: Imagine if Zardes had connected on that cross...Yowza. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Rolando Blackburn (Panama).

timelineItems.name: Scott W. Nicholls
timelineItems.text: Zardes' movement off the ball very good, too. Bradley quietly running the show. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Fletcher Nostradamus
timelineItems.text: Wondolowski with the wrong time to use a Backheel #USMNT

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: That was a great ball across from Yedlin to find Dempsey on the back side. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Kevin Case
timelineItems.text: Love to hear that Carlos Bocanegra has been involved with #USMNT January camp. When I think of a US captain, I will always think of him.

timelineItems.name: Brent
timelineItems.text: Jermaine is showing his age. Also, watch Dempsey's hammy.. Looked like he strained it during that last rush. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Kyle Sanders
timelineItems.text: US is putting some good pressure on Panama to begin the second half. A few decent half-chances here and there #USAvPAN #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Anthony DeAngelo
timelineItems.text: Kitchen allows Bradley to move forward where he's dangerous. Would be great to see. #usmnt

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Panama. Ricardo Buitrago tries a through ball, but Rolando Blackburn is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Panama just brought on 17 year old Ismael Diaz. Always cool to see kids so young get a chance. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: Michael Bradley with spacing and time in the midfield. http://t.co/nH1LsXphVd

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Anibal Godoy (Panama).
Clint Dempsey (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Hand ball by DeAndre Yedlin (USA).

timelineItems.name: MassiveCity
timelineItems.text: Jeez Yedlin. Can we call that an attempt on goal? #USMNT #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Katherine Rupp
timelineItems.text: Would be cool if Zardes notches a goal at StubHub. Would be electric. Was at Sporting Park when Zusi got a US goal & was awesome. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jermaine Jones (USA) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Michael Bradley.

timelineItems.name: Jim Grundy
timelineItems.text: I think Panama also wanted to watch Jermaine Jones score there. Can't blame them. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Paul Kennedy
timelineItems.text: Jones-to-Dempsey, center back-to-deep-lying forward. Kind of simple play JK wants and #USMNT needs more of.

timelineItems.comment: Leonel Parris (Panama) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Brek Shea (USA).

timelineItems.name: Carlos D. Mojica
timelineItems.text: Bradley and Yedlin have all looked great tonight. Still, I would like to see a more defensive minded mid alongside Bradley. #USAvPAN #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Miguel Ibarra (USA).
Eric Davis (Panama) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: #USMNT @jermainejunior snaps a header on goal. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Jarrod Connally
timelineItems.text: Who is Mix looking for? Villa? Lamps? He hasn't found a #USMNT player going forward yet...

timelineItems.comment: Leonel Parris (Panama) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Chris Wondolowski (USA).

timelineItems.name: Ben Nadeau
timelineItems.text: Even Jurgen Klinsmann had a good chuckle at Chris Wondolowski trying to intimidate anybody. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Geoff LaTulippe
timelineItems.text: Zares and Bradley have been exceptional today. But I just don't understand moving Yedlin to FB. It feels neutralizing. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Is Mix Diskerud even playing today? I think I've seen him like three times...very quiet performance, which might not be a bad thing. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Drew Olsen
timelineItems.text: Wondo is making Bobby Wood look like a prodigy. #USAvPAN #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Alexi Lalas
timelineItems.text: Simply passing along his recipe for Chicken Piccata. RT @KevinJr29 Can u translate for us what Wondo just said?? #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: Brian Sciaretta
timelineItems.text: Yedlin having a shaky first few minutes here. #usmnt

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: #USMNT captain @clint_dempsey hustling to keep the ball in play. #USAvPAN http://t.co/oC2VltAjDT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Chris Wondolowski (USA).
Eric Davis (Panama) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Anibal Godoy (Panama).
Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Brek Shea just wasted the best cross of his life on Wondo. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.comment: Chris Wondolowski (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Harold Cummings (Panama).

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: Hedges comes on and immediately tells Besler and Jones they're going to three at the back. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Jacob Aehl
timelineItems.text: I love Wondo and I like that he's getting into it and fighting, but I think the minutes could be better used on a young player. #USAvPAN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Anibal Godoy (Panama).
Gyasi Zardes (USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 10 - Ten players have now earned their first cap for #USMNT since the World Cup ended. Growth.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Panama. Conceded by Brek Shea.
Foul by Brek Shea (USA).
Hecgar Murillo (Panama) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: Crowd would have gone wild if the hometown @LAGalaxy product @gyasinho poked that in. http://t.co/AUKYWcObbw

timelineItems.name: Andrew Marcinko
timelineItems.text: Ibarra has been just a touch below the speed of play IMO. Not a bad performance. Just not really good either. #USMNT #NASL

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Luis Ovalle (Panama) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Clint Dempsey (USA).

timelineItems.name: Peter Galindo
timelineItems.text: There have been instances when the #USMNT defence has had too much space in behind. If Panama can get a through ball in... Oof

timelineItems.name: Vance Lawrence
timelineItems.text: #USMNT How is it that in the past seven international friendlies, we have scored 0 in the 2nd half? Let's change that right quick

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Chin Hormechea (Panama).
Clint Dempsey (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Sara Flores 🐨
timelineItems.text: USA Game ⚽️🇺🇸 #USA #AmericanOutlaws #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Michael Pourmohsen
timelineItems.text: U.S. Vs. Panama soccer match @stubhubcenter. #usmnt

timelineItems.name: i_am_ilana
timelineItems.text: Things are getting weird here. #ussoccer #usmnt #USAvPAN

timelineItems.text: Hawthorne’s finest. http://t.co/XHWa1BQIIk #USAvPAN http://t.co/ZPKxL585Qs

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: @gyasinho earns his first start today for the #USMNT in his own backyard. #USAvPAN #LA

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: Shea dropping in now in the late stages. Panama offering no threat, in truth. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: 自宅警備員
timelineItems.text:
First Sunday off since the World Cup... What do I do? 
Watch the #usmnt vs #panama

timelineItems.text: #CienPenedo #USAvPAN http://t.co/O6Kie80m1l

timelineItems.name: Miriti Murungi
timelineItems.text: #USMNT growing some dope left backs. Brek Shea following in the footsteps of DaMarcus. Someone needs to write a book about it.

timelineItems.name: Brian Johnson
timelineItems.text: @AmericanOutlaws @SDDragoons #USAvPAN http://t.co/jjys7JITbR

timelineItems.name: Andy Cole
timelineItems.text: If Jozy doesn't score today with the attack-minded lineup the #USMNT is fielding...........

timelineItems.name: isaac lampner
timelineItems.text: Jones will never be a center back. Don't get why Hedges doesn't get a shot. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer

timelineItems.name: Ives Galarcep
timelineItems.text: Prediction time: a 2-1 #USMNT victory, with goals from Zardes and Altidore. Think Bradley has a MOTM showing today. Interested to see Ibarra

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: Here we go! #USMNT #USAvPAN http://t.co/ZxF4VlQrDg

timelineItems.name: Kevin Case
timelineItems.text: Does Jurgen not know where to play Lee Nguyen? Because every time I see him get time w/ #USMNT I want to see more.

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Sauerschell
timelineItems.text: Zardes now on the left, his familiar LA position, Nguyen on the right with Gil off Wondo #USAvPAN

timelineItems.text: 10 minutes to go in Carson...#USMNT looking to see this one out and snag a win! http://t.co/mIl4jgRuFF

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: With 79 minutes today, @maibarra10 is subbed out. Great work today Miguel! #USAvPAN #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Jeff Crandall
timelineItems.text: Trying to think of other #USMNT players, that played significant # of games and evoked the same reaction Wondo gets...

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: 20,271 is todays attendance at @StubHubCenter. #AmazingSupport http://t.co/sAjDGZN7zi

timelineItems.name: Aaron Stollar
timelineItems.text: Well, the #USMNT was fine. Nothing more, nothing less. Klinsmann is still feeling around for answers with the defense, sadly.

timelineItems.name: Eddie Garcia
timelineItems.text: #USAvPAN #ussoccer http://t.co/5sJY189PiN

timelineItems.name: Kevin Case
timelineItems.text: Not sure how good Miguel Ibarra is yet, but no doubt the dude is wicked fast. You can't teach speed. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Jesse Gilmore
timelineItems.text: Wasn't pretty at times, but we're trending upward, which is VITAL for our upcoming schedule. #brutal #USAvPAN

timelineItems.name: EvanFCB
timelineItems.text: The #USMNT's pacey outside backs are a major strength.

timelineItems.name: Jimmy Conrad
timelineItems.text: I just witnessed an Olimpico, Clint Dempsey's 40th goal for his country, and #Wondo's WWE antics in the second half. I feel satiated. #USMNT
